name: TbaytelTV
0:
”Alexa, ask t. v. service to tune to TSN”
”Alexa, tell t. v. service to play The Big Bang Theory”
”Alexa, ask t. v. service to search for New Amsterdam”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: t. v. service
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Ask Alexa to tune to a channel by channel name or channel number, play a currently airing program and even pause, rewind and fast forward live TV. Plus, ask Alexa to search shows by program name or actor to easily find something great to watch. 
 
Restrictions: 
- Available for residential Tbaytel TV subscribers
- A myTbaytel account is required to log into to this service
 
For additional details and support, please visit tbaytel.net/tvvoice
